name: Soluna Holdings, Inc.
description: Soluna Holdings, Inc. is an innovative technology company focused on sustainable energy and computing solutions. Founded in 2018 and headquartered in New York, Soluna aims to revolutionize the way we generate and utilize energy for digital infrastructure. The company specializes in the development of green energy projects, particularly in wind and solar, to power data centers and cryptocurrency mining operations. By leveraging renewable energy sources, Soluna not only addresses the growing demand for energy in the digital economy but also contributes to reducing carbon footprints. The company operates through its unique model of integrating energy production with computing needs, thus providing a scalable and environmentally friendly solution. Soluna's mission is to create a sustainable future by enabling a more efficient and responsible energy consumption model, and it continues to explore partnerships and projects that align with this vision. With a commitment to innovation, Soluna is well-positioned at the intersection of technology and sustainability, striving to set new standards in the industry.

seo.meta_title: Soluna Holdings, Inc. | Sustainable Energy and Computing Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Soluna Holdings, Inc., a leader in sustainable energy and innovative computing solutions. Discover our commitment to green energy projects powering the digital economy.

faq.answer: Soluna Holdings focuses on sustainable energy solutions and integrating renewable energy with computing needs.

faq.answer: John Doe is the CEO of Soluna Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Soluna headquartered?
faq.answer: Soluna is headquartered in New York, USA.

faq.answer: Soluna's main products include renewable energy projects and computing infrastructure solutions.
